org.java.api.aws.ses

Class SESClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.java.api.aws.ses.SESClientBuilder

  • public class SESClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a builder for the AWS SES Client.
    Author:
    Raghuram Challapalli

    • Constructor Detail

      • SESClientBuilder

        public SESClientBuilder(java.lang.String displayName,
                        java.lang.String emailAddress,
                        com.amazonaws.regions.Regions region,
                        java.lang.String accessKeyId,
                        java.lang.String secretAccessKey)
        Defines the configuration parameters required for the AWS SES Client.
        Parameters:
        displayName - Name to be displayed in the From section of the email.
        emailAddress - Email address to be displayed as the from email. This has to be a verified email with AWS.
        region - AWS Server region used to send emails using AWS SES.
        accessKeyId - AWS access key Id. This can be obtained from the AWS SES Console.
        secretAccessKey - AWS Secret Access Key. This can be obtained from the AWS SES Console.

    • Method Detail

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(SESEmailMessage email)
        Sends an email using the AWS SES API.
        Parameters:
        email - SESEmailMessage object containing the required information.
        Returns:
        true if the email was sent successfully; false otherwise

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(SESEmailMessage email,
                         java.lang.String footerText)
        Sends an email using the AWS SES API.
        Parameters:
        email - SESEmailMessage object containing the required information.
        footerText - Customized footer text that will be added at the end of the message. Should be a properly formatted HTML string.
        Returns:
        true if the email is sent successfully; false otherwise

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(SESEmailMessage email,
                         java.lang.String displayName,
                         java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Sends an email using the AWS SES API.
        Parameters:
        email - SESEmailMessage object containing the required information.
        displayName - Name to be displayed in the "From" section of the email.
        emailAddress - Email address of the sender. This email address has to be a verified email with AWS. This will override the default email address.
        Returns:
        true if the email is sent successfully; false otherwise

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(SESEmailMessage email,
                         java.lang.String footerText,
                         java.lang.String displayName,
                         java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Sends an email using the AWS SES API.
        Parameters:
        email - SESEmailMessage object containing the required information.
        footerText - Customized footer text that will be added at the end of the message. Should be a properly formatted HTML string.
        displayName - Name to be displayed in the "From" section of the email.
        emailAddress - Email address of the sender. This email address has to be a verified email with AWS. This will override the default email address.
        Returns:
        true if the email is sent successfully; false otherwise
